page.title: 09The Fylde Garden Centre
page.content:
The Fylde Garden Centre is 9 acres in size, making it the largest in the Fylde. It is undergoing {extensive modernisation}and, when completed, it will sell over 500 different types of plants grown in {four huge greenhouses.}Temperature must be maintained at 60 degrees Fahrenheit.
A quick turnover is required as all plants must be sold within two months of their being brought from the nurseries.
{Open seven days a week,}the centre will have a swimming pool, children's play area, butterfly house, pond garden, restaurant and general shop.
